greetingText: Every day with you feels like a celebration, but today is extra special because...
wishText: May your days be as bright as your smile!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to the most amazing person ever!.
text2: That's what I was going to say at first.
outroText: Now, go ahead and tell meâ€”did this make you smile as much as I hoped?
